ssot__ConsentAction__dlm.name: Consent Action
ssot__ConsentAction__dlm.description: The Consent Action DMO represents what a user consents to regarding their data, such as data collection or web activity tracking.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Consent Action DMO.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to system that External Record Id was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.
